basics.name: Alex ( Allene )
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I've used ExpoGo to finish a couple of React Native mobile apps, which made the CI/CD setup simple. The rest of the completed projects will be Python modules, React web applications with TypeScript and MUI, REST APIs with Node.js and Express, document-oriented databases and tools.
